files.template:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: myapp
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector: { matchLabels: { app: myapp } }
  template:
    metadata: { labels: { app: myapp } }
    spec:
      containers:
        - name: app
          image: nginx:alpine
          ports: [ { containerPort: 80 } ]

apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: myapp
spec:
  type: ClusterIP
  selector: { app: myapp }
  ports: [ { port: 80, targetPort: 80 } ]
